articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A plane crashed at Toronto Pearson International Airport on Monday, officials said, with CBC television reporting the plane flipped on landing.
articles.title: Delta plane flips on landing at Toronto airport, injuring 8

articles.author: John Irish, Elizabeth Pineau
articles.description: The acceleration in Ukraine diplomacy means Europe needs to do more and in a better way, a French presidency official said ahead of informal talks later on Monday among several key European leaders in Paris.
articles.title: Fast-moving Ukraine diplomacy means Europeans must do more, official says

articles.author: Joshua McElwee
articles.description: Doctors have had to change treatment for Pope Francis' respiratory tract infection to tackle a "complex clinical situation" and he will remain in hospital for as long as necessary, the Vatican said on Monday.
articles.title: Pope's treatment changed to tackle 'complex' clinical situation, Vatican says

articles.author: Michael Martina, Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard
articles.description: Taiwan is exploring buying arms worth billions of dollars from the United States, sources briefed on the matter said, hoping to win support from the new Trump administration as China continues to apply military pressure on the island.
articles.title: Exclusive: Taiwan considering multi-billion dollar arms purchase from US, sources say

articles.author: Maayan Lubell
articles.description: Families of some Israeli hostages in Gaza have received signs of life from their loved ones for the first time in more than a year via captives who have been freed over the past weeks in the ceasefire deal with Hamas.
articles.title: Freed hostages bring signs of life from depths of Gaza tunnels

articles.author: Daniel Trotta, Jasper Ward
articles.description: New York Governor Kathy Hochul on Monday said she will meet key leaders on Tuesday for a conversation about the future of embattled New York City Mayor Eric Adams, as she faces pressure to remove him from office after President Donald Trump's Justice Department asked to drop criminal charges against him.
articles.title: New York Governor Hochul to meet for talks on embattled NYC mayor

articles.author: Jatindra Dash, Gopal Sharma
articles.description: India has assured students from Nepal of its efforts to ensure their well-being, following protests triggered by the suicide of a Nepali woman studying in the eastern state of Odisha.
articles.title: India reassures Nepali students after suicide sparked protest

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Vietnam's National Assembly will on Tuesday approve a bold bureaucratic reform plan that will slash up to a fifth of government bodies, as it tries to cut costs and improve administrative efficiency.
articles.title: Vietnam parliament to approve plan for leaner government

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Russian government on Monday released a U.S. citizen that had been detained on charges of possession of a small amount of marijuana, ahead of talks between Russian and U.S. officials in Saudi Arabia, the New York Times reported.
articles.title: Russia frees American prisoner ahead of talks with US, New York Times reports

articles.author: Alexander Cornwell
articles.description: U.S. Republican Senator Lindsey Graham dismissed on Monday President Donald Trump's proposal to seize Gaza and force out the Palestinians, while Democrat Senator Richard Blumenthal said he expects Arab states to put forward a workable alternative.
articles.title: In Israel, US senators dismiss Trump's Gaza plan, say Arab states to have viable alternative
